contractURI().notice: A contract URI for the given drop contract

tokenURI(uint256).notice: A token URI for the given drops contract

updateMetadataBase(address,string,string.notice: Update metadata base URI and contract URI

updateMetadataBaseWithDetails(address,st.notice: Update metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing detailsUpdate metadata base URI, extension, contract URI and freezing details

contractURI().details: reverts if a contract uri is not provided

tokenURI(uint256).details: reverts if a contract uri is not set

params.newContractUri: new contract URI (can be an empty string)

params.freezeAt: time to freeze the contract metadata at (set to 0 to disable)
params.metadataBase: new base URI to update metadata with
params.metadataExtension: new extension to append to base metadata URI
params.target: target contract to update metadata for
